alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Collier, Hendry, northern Broward, southwestern Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Montura, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Montura, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Copeland, Hendry Correctional, Port La Belle, Big Cypress National Preserve, Devils Garden, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Felda, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County
